title: MojangNameHistoryInsert
description: An array's object for name change history, replys with a result from Mojang's public API or Kelpstone's cached copy.

record.description: A schema-unique identifier for internal databases and body object referencing methods.

name.description: The player's non-case-sensitive username on Mojang/Minecraft.

nameFancy.description: The player's name stylized with their choice of capitalization upon registration.

dateline.description: Where the entry resides in the history of a player's Mojang identity history.

start.description:
Either a timestamp or null if it was the original name created with the account.

Mojang does not provide a date for account creation because of their security questions using it as a form of validation.

end.description: Either a Timestamp or "true" if still using.
